SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler

Interface UpdateState

All Known Implementing Classes:
POP3Connection
public interface UpdateState
Operations available when responding to QUIT in TRANSACTION state.

This interface is provided to TransactionHandler.quit(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.UpdateState) and allows the handler to commit mailbox changes (delete marked messages) and close the connection (RFC 1939 Section 6).

This transitions the connection to the UPDATE state, where the mailbox is closed and changes are committed.

Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
  • TransactionHandler.quit(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.UpdateState)

  • Method Details

    • commitAndClose

      void commitAndClose()
      Commits deletions and closes the connection successfully.

      Sends a +OK response indicating the session ended normally and all marked messages were deleted. ClientConnected.disconnected() will be called.

    • commitAndClose

      void commitAndClose(String message)
      Commits deletions and closes with a custom message.
      Parameters:
      message - the farewell message

    • partialCommit

      void partialCommit(String message)
      Some messages could not be deleted.

      Sends a -ERR response indicating some messages were not deleted. The connection is still closed.

      Parameters:
      message - the error message describing the failure

    • updateFailed

      void updateFailed(String message)
      The update failed entirely.

      Sends a -ERR response indicating the update failed. The connection is still closed.

      Parameters:
      message - the error message
